EXECUTIVE CHEF

SUMMARY

To obtain a challenging position where experience as an Executive
Chef and a food handlers license will be utilized. And experience
working for multiple James Beard Award winners Alfred Portale and
Paul Bartolotta.
Core Qualifications
Executive Chef
Menu Developing
Chef de Cuisine
Schedule,Food &Labor
Executive Sous Chef
Inventory &Ordering
Sous Chef
Microsoft Excel &Word

Executive Chef
Company Name
— City , State

prep

Structured and maintained accurate payroll, scheduling, food
costing, inventory and ordering.
